"Echo":
"Whoa, I am completely exhausted now. But at
least that's over!"

"And I have to say, wow, you are really
something else!"

"I don't mean just your sheer power alone.
You're also gutsy in battle and a really quick
thinker. You've got it all."

"I don't get it. I try and I try, but in every possible
area, it feels like you just keep leaving me in
the dust. Is something wrong with me?"

"Ugh, I guess there's no point worrying about it.
Let's head home."

"はぁ、はぁ……
ようやく終わったぁ。"

"……今さらだけどさ。
きみはやっぱり強いね。"

"強いって、力だけじゃなくてさ。
戦う上での度胸も
とっさの判断も、全部。"

"なんだろう。あたしだって
頑張ってるつもりなのに
どんどん離されてく気がする。"

"……ううん、こんなこと言ってても
どうにもならないか。
さ、帰還しましょう。"
